actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a deduction for contributions made to candidates for public office.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for political contributions or newsletter fund contributions to candidates for public office. Limits the deduction to $25 ($50 for joint returns).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a deduction for contributions made to candidates for public office.
